pullrequest.title: middleware split: allResources becomes userResources and allResources

content.raw: ya it's going to be a pain to keep track of everything. Hopefully whenever a dependency package's version in package.json is updated, our tests will catch that things are broken before deployment. We should also remember to hit the Reset Dependency Cache button in codeship to clear the node modules.
content.html: ya it's going to be a pain to keep track of everything. Hopefully whenever a dependency package's version in package.json is updated, our tests will catch that things are broken before deployment. We should also remember to hit the Reset Dependency Cache button in codeship to clear the node modules.
